name: Yoga and Adventure in Rishikesh
description:
Located closer to Haridwar, Rishikesh is also one of the holiest places in India. While in Rishikesh, one can easily attain serenity, peace of mind and soul. The chanting of morning prayers from the various temples, ashrams and other religious centres in the town makes it one of the pious destinations to seek spirituality.

The presence of the river Ganges at the footsteps of the Himalayan range makes Rishikesh, one of the ideal places to experience adventure sports like river-rafting, trekking and mountaineering. This itinerary has been designed in a way, alongside spirituality it also offer the opportunity to experience some of these adventure sports.
